description:
The law firm of Hampilos & Associates, Ltd., located in Rockford, Illinois, offers a full line of legal services in several different practice areas in order to help individuals, families and business owners with their most important and serious legal issues. Serving all of Winnebago County and the surrounding areas of Northern Illinois, our founder, George P. Hampilos, provides exceptional legal representation to those facing legal challenges involving any of the following:

• Bankruptcy

• Collections and Creditors’ Rights

• Business Law

• Civil and Commercial Litigation

• Property and Real Estate Matters

• Family Law

• Estate Planning

• Estate Administration and Probate

• Personal Injury

Mr. Hampilos has practiced law since 1992, and he established Hampilos & Associates, Ltd. with a mission to deliver the highest level of legal advocacy possible to those in need. Fully dedicated to protecting your rights and best interests, Mr. Hampilos will work closely with you to fully understand your situation so that he can devise the best strategy to help you achieve the positive results you expect.

Regardless of how complex or challenging your case, you can trust our law firm to help you find a solution. For more information, contact Hampilos & Associates, Ltd. to schedule to schedule an initial consultation.
